Text.Page:
I'd love to have you stick around here, , but I'll be honest: they need you more in the Blazing Vale.

Check in at Firebase Intrepid. May your strength suffice!

Every able-bodied soldier is a blessing around here, especially a proper .

Helone can put you to work. Talk to her, but talk to her slowly. She gets confused easily.

Do not speak to me like I'm a child, . Such behavior diminishes us both.

Also, think twice before paying any attention to Kimuk. He's a mouth-breather, pure and simple.
